verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1352><s%> leaving <S%G863><s%> the principles <S%G746><s%> of the doctrine <S%G3056><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, let us go on <S%G5342><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> perfection <S%G5047><s%>; not <S%G3361><s%> laying <S%G2598><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> the foundation <S%G2310><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%> from <S%G575><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> toward <S%G1909><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>,

Of the doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of baptisms <S%G909><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> of laying on <S%G1936><s%> of hands <S%G5495><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> of resurrection <S%G386><s%> of the dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> judgment <S%G2917><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is impossible <S%G102><s%> for those who were once <S%G530><s%> enlightened <S%G5461><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> have tasted <S%G1089><s%> of the heavenly <S%G2032><s%> gift <S%G1431><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> were made <S%G1096><s%> partakers <S%G3353><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>,
And <S%G2532><s%> have tasted <S%G1089><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> the powers <S%G1411><s%> of the world <S%G165><s%> to come <S%G3195><s%>,

If <S%G2532><s%> they shall fall away <S%G3895><s%>, to renew them <S%G340><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%>; seeing they crucify <S%G388><s%> to themselves <S%G1438><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> afresh <S%G388><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> put him to an open shame <S%G3856><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> drinketh in <S%G4095><s%> the rain <S%G5205><s%> that cometh <S%G2064><s%> oft <S%G4178><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> bringeth forth <S%G5088><s%> herbs <S%G1008><s%> meet <S%G2111><s%> for them <S%G1565><s%> <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> it is dressed <S%G1090><s%>, receiveth <S%G3335><s%> blessing <S%G2129><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> that which beareth <S%G1627><s%> thorns <S%G173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> briers <S%G5146><s%> is rejected <S%G96><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is nigh <S%G1451><s%> unto cursing <S%G2671><s%>; whose <S%G3739><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> is to <S%G1519><s%> be burned <S%G2740><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%>, beloved <S%G27><s%>, we are persuaded <S%G3982><s%> better things <S%G2909><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> things that accompany <S%G2192><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%>, though <S%G1499><s%> we <S%G2980><s%> thus <S%G3779><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> unrighteous <S%G94><s%> to forget <S%G1950><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> labour <S%G2873><s%> of love <S%G26><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> ye have shewed <S%G1731><s%> <S%G1731><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>, in that ye have ministered <S%G1247><s%> to the saints <S%G40><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> do minister <S%G1247><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> we desire <S%G1937><s%> that every one <S%G1538><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> do shew <S%G1731><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> diligence <S%G4710><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the full assurance <S%G4136><s%> of hope <S%G1680><s%> unto <S%G891><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%>:

That <S%G3363><s%> ye be <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3363><s%> slothful <S%G3576><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> followers <S%G3402><s%> of them who through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> patience <S%G3115><s%> inherit <S%G2816><s%> the promises <S%G1860><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> when God <S%G2316><s%> made promise <S%G1861><s%> to Abraham <S%G11><s%>, because <S%G1893><s%> he could <S%G2192><s%> swear <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%>, he sware <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>,

Saying <S%G3004><s%>, Surely <S%G2229><s%> <S%G3375><s%> blessing <S%G2127><s%> I will bless <S%G2127><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> multiplying <S%G4129><s%> I will multiply <S%G4129><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%>, after he had patiently endured <S%G3114><s%>, he obtained <S%G2013><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> men <S%G444><s%> verily <S%G3303><s%> swear <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> the greater <S%G3187><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> an oath <S%G3727><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> confirmation <S%G951><s%> is to them <S%G846><s%> an end <S%G4009><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> strife <S%G485><s%>.

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, willing <S%G1014><s%> more abundantly <S%G4054><s%> to shew <S%G1925><s%> unto the heirs <S%G2818><s%> of promise <S%G1860><s%> the immutability <S%G276><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> counsel <S%G1012><s%>, confirmed <S%G3315><s%> it by an oath <S%G3727><s%>:

That <S%G2443><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> immutable <S%G276><s%> things <S%G4229><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> it was impossible <S%G102><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> to lie <S%G5574><s%>, we might have <S%G2192><s%> a strong <S%G2478><s%> consolation <S%G3874><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> have fled for refuge <S%G2703><s%> to lay hold <S%G2902><s%> upon the hope <S%G1680><s%> set before us <S%G4295><s%>:

Which <S%G3739><s%> hope we have <S%G2192><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> an anchor <S%G45><s%> of the soul <S%G5590><s%>, both <S%G5037><s%> sure <S%G804><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stedfast <S%G949><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> which entereth <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> that within <S%G2082><s%> the veil <S%G2665><s%>;

Whither <S%G3699><s%> the forerunner <S%G4274><s%> is <S%G1525><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%>, even Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, made <S%G1096><s%> an high priest <S%G749><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchisedec <S%G3198><s%>.
